basic_info.description:
As a passionate full stack developer, I have the expertise to create exceptional web experiences from start to finish. 🌐💻 
My versatility allows me to master both front-end development, with a focus on user interface and user experience, and back-end development, building robust and secure systems. 🔧
My problem-solving approach enables me to translate ideas into working code efficiently and elegantly. 💡💪
Thanks to my database management and deployment skills, I'm able to deliver complete solutions that are ready to be used by users. 🔧🚀
With my expertise in full stack development, I'm ready to add significant value to any project and contribute to its success. 💯🔥

projects.title: Booki
projects.description: The aim of this project was to integrate a model from scratch using HTML and CSS only. Challenges: getting to grips with git and github and working to the pixel following a mockup, all the while making the site desktop-first responsive.

projects.title: Kasa
projects.description: Project to use React to integrate the mockup of a short-term accommodation search site for individuals. Challenges : Understanding React's tree system and learning to use SAAS to save CSS time.

projects.title: Mon Vieux Grimoire
projects.description: Here's a project where I was asked to help integrate a functional back-end. Here the main challenge was to enable the creation of users, their secure management (password hashing, authentication tokens), and the dynamic addition and deletion of books.

experience.company: Maîtres du Massage | Carrure Parfaite | Jardin Céleste
experience.title: Website creation by CMS
Bac +2 Web developer
mainTech: HTML | CSS | JavaScript | React | NodeJS | TypeScript
